title: How can i minimaze the size of the game
body: How can I minimize the size  of the game , because I have not so much space in memory card ?

replies.body: Reinstall the game, I did it yesterday and instead of 13gb Riot Games folder is only 5.7gb now.

There aren't any files that can really be removed, and trying to would cause the patcher to rescan your game files and add them back.  [Once the updated client is no longer in testing](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/client-beta-update-2-replacing-legacy-client-1), any excess data from the legacy client would be removed, which should free up more space.  Let me know if that clears things up!
